name: Binopoly
description: Binopoly is a play-to-earn capital operation game powered by blockchain technology, and the first in blockchain to integrate real-world geography into the game world. Consisting of 7 continents and 195 countries, each continent has one piece of public land providing new players all materials necessary for initial world-building. Gradually, Binopoly will open more and more cities and private land slots (maximum 6 private land slots in one city) for players to expand their economic empire.
